articles.title: Trump Wins Iowa Republican Caucus with Decisive Victory
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump secured a significant win in the Iowa Republican caucuses, defeating rivals Ron DeSantis and Nikki Haley with over 50% of the vote and strengthening his path to the 2024 Republican presidential nomination.

articles.title: US and UK Launch Strikes Against Houthi Targets in Yemen
articles.description: American and British military forces conducted coordinated airstrikes against Houthi rebel military installations in Yemen, targeting sites used to launch attacks on commercial shipping in the Red Sea region.

articles.title: Apple Unveils Vision Pro Mixed Reality Headset
articles.description: Apple officially launched its highly anticipated Vision Pro mixed reality headset, priced at $3,499, marking the company's first major new product category since the Apple Watch in 2015.
